data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dalgleish, Robert C., Price, Roger D. (2005): Two new species of the genus Myrsidea Waterston (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae) from cotingas (Passeriformes: Cotingidae). Zootaxa 983: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171366
